content.question: Which of the following will happen if the firm continues to hire additional units of labor beyond <math alttext="L sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> in the short run?

choices.label: The firm’s marginal cost will decrease.
The firm will begin experiencing diminishing marginal returns.
The firm’s fixed cost will increase.
The average product of labor will be equal to zero.
The total product of labor will decrease.

content.answer: The total product of labor will decrease.
